Good Comments: Given that 8thsin often lends his talents to trollsub groups, his absence here is a good thing. Good release, decent styling, not too literal or too liberal.
I'd rate these guys about an 9 out of 10. Only reason a point is taken off is because of slightly slow speeds for ep 1.
A liberal translation of "oppai" is no where near "cream pie".
Few QC error, but the quality is top-notch
A great version. Go with them.
Best quality subs. They just run a day or two behind the pack. Worth it imo
take long time to release, but this the best choice for quality
Its good, the subs not the show

U made a really great job. Good work!

The translation is too liberal, and the translation text tries FAR too hard to make the characters sound like Americans. The anime is set in Japan, not the USA. And translating "oppai" as "creampie" in ep4 was one of the dumbest translations ever.
